findings.title: Elevated Impact to Smart Contract Safety and Security
findings.description: Active smart contract owner privileges constitute an elevated impact to smart contract safety and security.
findings.location: Contracts, specifically related to owner's privileges.

findings.title: Change Max Transaction %
findings.description: Smart contract owner can change max transaction %. The smart contract owner can change the value to "zero". No arbitrary limit set.

findings.title: Lock or Unlock the Smart Contract Function Modules
findings.description: Smart contract owner can lock or unlock the smart contract function modules.
findings.location: Contracts, specifically related to owner's privileges.

findings.title: Change Transaction Fees
findings.description: Smart contract owner can change transaction fees. This function module can be used to impose extraordinary transaction fees. No arbitrary limit set.
findings.location: Contracts, specifically related to owner's privileges.
